## ApiNamespaceAria2.purgeDownloadResult() method

This method purges completed/error/removed downloads to free memory. This method returns OK.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
purgeDownloadResult(): Promise<'OK'>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;'OK'&gt;

string 'OK'
